attributes.action: Force Boris Johnson to call a general election!
attributes.additional_details: Considering how Boris was such an outspoken of how Gordon Brown became PM since he didn't win a general election, let him hold himself to the same standards!
attributes.background: Boris Johnson was voted in to be PM by less than 0.3 percent of the population, if we get around 200000 signatories this is more than how many people voted for him!
